Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Did you hear the one about the mountain goats in the andes? It was 'ba a a a a a d'.
I never forget a face, but in your case I'll make an exception.
It is better to be silent and be thought a fool, than to open your mouth and remove all doubt.
What did the buddhist say to the hot dog vendor?  'make me one with everything.'
NASA recently sent a number of holsteins into orbit for experimental purposes., they called it the herd shot round the world.

Two boll weevils grew up in s. carolina. one took off to hollywood  and became a rich star. the other stayed in carolina and never amounted to much and naturally became known as the lesser of two weevils.
Two eskimos in a kayak were chilly, so they started a fire, which sank the craft, proving the old adage you can't have your kayak and heat it too.
A 3-legged dog walks into an old west saloon, slides up to the bar and announces 'I'm looking for the man who shot my paw.'
Did you hear about the buddhist who went to the dentist, and refused to take novocain? he wanted to transcend dental medication.
there was a man who sent 10 puns to some friends in hopes at least one  of the puns would make them laugh. unfortunately no pun in ten did!!!
What do you get when you cross a murderer and frosted flakes? A cereal killer.
What do you get when you cross a country and an automobile? Carnation.
What do you get when you cross a cheetah and a hamburger? Fast food.
What do you get when you cross finals and a chicken? Eggs-ams.
What do you get when you cross a rabbit and a lawn sprinkler? Hare spray.
What do you get when you cross an excited alien and a chicken? Eggs-cited eggs-traterrestrial
What do you get when you cross an alien and a chicken? Eggs-traterrestrial.
What do you get when you cross music and an automobile? Cartune.
What do you get when you cross sour music and an assistant? A tart-ificial intelligence!
What do you get when you cross music and an assistant? A symphony of helpfulness!
What do you get when you cross a serious thief and a mad young man? A con-fused criminal!
What do you get when you cross a serious thief and a crazy rabbit? A hare-raising heist!
What do you get when you cross a poppy and electricity? A shocking bloom!
What do you get when you cross a dance and a cheetah? The fastest moves on the floor!
What do you get when you cross a dance and a lemon? A tangy tango!
What do you get when you cross a port and frosted flakes? A shipping crunch!
What do you get when you cross a port and a murderer? A dock of death!
What do you get when you cross a bank and a skunk? A vault that really stinks!
What do you get when you cross a ding and milk? A dairy ring!
What do you get when you cross a road and a strawberry? A traffic jam!
What do you get when you cross a road and jelly? A slippery intersection!
What do you get when you cross a toad and a galaxy? A star-hopper!
What do you get when you cross a dog and sandpaper? A rough bark!
What do you get when you cross a bug and a relative? An ant-uncle!
What do you get when you cross a bad bug and canned sand? A pest thatâ€™s really grating!
What do you get when you cross an ant and a rabbit? A hopping worker!
What do you get when you cross a cat and a purple person? A meow-velous grape!
What do you get when you cross a cat and a killer? A purr-derer!
What do you get when you cross a cat and a lemon? A sourpuss!
What do you get when you cross a cat and a tune? A meow-sician!
What do you get when you cross a cat and a band? A purr-cussionist!
What do you get when you cross a pig and a ninja? A pork chop!
What do you get when you cross a crazy cow and a banned parrot? An udderly rebellious squawk!
What do you get when you cross a cow and a lemon? A moooo-tastic zest!
What do you get when you cross a bad cow and a canned hat? A moo-sbehaving lid!
